Html: I run my computer at 192dpi, and the boots and wrist do not show up at all in rawr because the program doesn't scale. I can load rawr on my other computer, but it's VERY slow and a bit of a pain. I was just curious if there's any chance of future releases adding support for higher DPI setups, even if it means removing the icons altogether and just using text instead.
Rawr3 will be in Silverlight/WPF, so will fully support any DPI.

Great, thanks for the info! Also, noticed I can use the comparisons tab on the right well enough to do what needs to be done. So if anyone else is having similar issues just keep that in mind. Right click to equip different gear etc.
